segment.source: Use the topics in this section to learn how to customize your Internet Explorer installation package, how to choose the right method for installation, and how to deploy IE into your environment.
segment.target: Use the topics in this section to learn how to customize your Internet Explorer installation package, how to choose the right method for installation, and how to deploy IE into your environment.

segment.source: Install and Deploy Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Install and Deploy Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.target: Install and Deploy Internet Explorer 11 (IE11)

segment.target: Applies to:

segment.target: Windows 10

segment.target: Windows 8.1 Update

segment.target: Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.target: Windows Server 2012 R2

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.source: Use the topics in this section to learn how to customize your Internet Explorer installation package, how to choose the right method for installation, and how to deploy IE into your environment.
segment.target: Use the topics in this section to learn how to customize your Internet Explorer installation package, how to choose the right method for installation, and how to deploy IE into your environment.

segment.source: You can also find more info about your virtualization options for legacy apps.
segment.target: You can also find more info about your virtualization options for legacy apps.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Customize Internet Explorer 11 installation packages
segment.target: Customize Internet Explorer 11 installation packages

segment.source: Guidance about how to use .INF files or the IE Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to create custom packages and about how to create those packages for multiple operating systems.
segment.target: Guidance about how to use .INF files or the IE Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to create custom packages and about how to create those packages for multiple operating systems.

segment.source: Choose how to install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11)
segment.target: Choose how to install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11)

segment.source: Guidance for the different ways you can install IE, including using System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager, Windows Server Update Services (WSUS), Microsoft Intune, your network, the operating system deployment system, or third-party tools.
segment.target: Guidance for the different ways you can install IE, including using System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager, Windows Server Update Services (WSUS), Microsoft Intune, your network, the operating system deployment system, or third-party tools.

segment.source: Choose how to deploy Internet Explorer 11 (IE11)
segment.target: Choose how to deploy Internet Explorer 11 (IE11)

segment.source: Guidance about how to deploy your custom version of IE using Automatic Version Synchronization (AVS) or using your software distribution tools.
segment.target: Guidance about how to deploy your custom version of IE using Automatic Version Synchronization (AVS) or using your software distribution tools.

segment.source: Virtualization and compatibility with Internet Explorer 11
segment.target: Virtualization and compatibility with Internet Explorer 11

segment.source: Info about the Microsoft-supported options for virtualizing web apps.
segment.target: Info about the Microsoft-supported options for virtualizing web apps.
